channel.title: package management on Bucket's Notes
channel.description: Recent content in package management on Bucket's Notes

item.title: managing packages
item.description: apt update then apt upgrade to update software apt install [package] dpkg -i [/path/to/package.deb] to install a .deb tar -xzvf [file.tar.gz] to unpack a tar add script in usr/bin to add program to dmenu #!/bin/sh /path/to/run/script apt show [package] check if a package is installed
